translations: 掘地洞，挖地道 ；偎依，钻到……下面；（在……里）搜寻；挖穿

sentences.sentence: They go back to their own burrow.
I come out of my burrow only at night to find food.
sentences.translation: 我只在夜间从洞穴中出来寻找食物。

sentences.sentence: The trip to the burrow prevents the squirrel from getting too hot.
sentences.translation: 回到地洞可以防止松鼠变得太热。
